FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Never a Dull Moment

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Can I play this card if I don’t have a Wrecker on my team?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Can I play this card if my opponent doesn’t have any Secret Actions in play?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    When I play this card, do I have to do one damage to one of my Wreckers?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    No, you do not. The “may” makes this an optional ability.
  4. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    When I play this card, can I do 1 damage to one of my Wreckers if my opponent doesn’t have a Secret Action in play?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes.
  5. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    When I play this card and I have a Specialist, do I have to make my opponent scrap a card?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes. This ability isn’t optional.
  6. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Can my opponent scrap the Secret Action for the second ability that I returned to their hand with the first ability?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes. Abilities on the card happen in order.
